segments.text: This is the route I thought we could take on our hike on Saturday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s about six or seven miles . That ’ s about ten kilometers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds OK . So , we start here at the car park and walk along the path to the waterfall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Then we turn left and walk up this small hill . The view from the top of the hill is worth the climb . We can eat a snack there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then we will follow this path down the hill to the old church .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can spend a few minutes looking around the church . Then , we turn right and walk along this path .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This path leads to the cave . Can we look inside the cave ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we can , but it isn ’ t very interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then we turn south and come back to the car park along this path .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long do you think it will take us to complete the walk ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it will take about four hours , including breaks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s fine . Are there signposts along the way , in case we get lost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there are . They tell use which way to go and how far we have to walk .
segments.speaker: S1
